result.longName: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides infrastructure construction services in China and internationally. It operates through two segments, Design, Survey, and Consultancy; and Construction Contracting. The company offers designing, surveying and mapping, monitoring, and consulting services for engineering of urban rail transit, industrial and civil construction, and municipal engineering projects; and construction contracting services for urban rail transit and the service concession arrangements under the build-operate-transfer arrangements. It also provides engineering consulting, monitoring, and testing services; architectural design services; rail transit engineering consulting services; technology development and consulting services; advisory services; and investment management services. In addition, the company is involved in property management activities; and construction project investment, construction, and operation maintenance activities, as well as railway operation management activities. The company was formerly known as Beijing Urban Construction Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited in October 2013. Beijing Urban Construction Design & Development Group Co., Limited was founded in 1958 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
